detail_desc: Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Tailored shorts in an airy weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a fake back pocket.
Leggings in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Pull-on trousers in a soft cotton weave with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, diagonal side pockets and gently tapered legs with elasticated hems.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a slight sheen, with a stand-up collar and detachable, padded hood. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, welt handwarmer pockets, flap patch pockets with a press-stud at the front, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Trousers in soft, patterned viscose jersey with wide elastication at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.

Sturdy imitation leather shoulder bag with two handles, a detachable adjustable shoulder strap and a zip at the top. One zipped outer compartment and one zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 5x30x40 cm.
Short jumper knitted in a soft alpaca blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton with a print motif and sequins.
Round-necked T-shirt in premium cotton jersey.
Running top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and reflective details. Regular fit.
Henley shirt in cotton jersey with a button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Short-sleeved, A-line dress in soft cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and hem. Unlined.

Super push-up lace bra with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
V-neck jumper in a soft, loose knit with dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in a soft cotton blend. T-shirt top in jersey with a round neck. Piqué shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Straight-cut shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke at the back and short sleeves. Unlined.
Patterned pyjama bottoms in a soft, airy cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and wide, straight legs.
Jumper in a soft knit in a slightly wider style with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hooded jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short shorts in a viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and gently rounded hems with short slits in the sides.
Cap in an airy cotton weave with a decorative bow on one side, sweatband inside and covered elastication at the back. Lined.

Large shopper in grained imitation leather with a matching, zip-top clutch bag attached to one handle. The shopper has a pair of longer and a pair of shorter handles and a magnetic press-stud fastener. Depth 20 cm. Height 32.5 cm. Width 58 cm.
Knee-length dress in a crinkled weave with narrow shoulder straps and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Sports tights in fast-drying, breathable, functional fabric with an elasticated waist.
Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a lined, drawstring hood, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Shirt in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Trousers woven in a cool linen blend with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Relaxed fit with a regular waist, fake fly and tapered legs.
Shorts in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, pleats at the top, zip fly, side pockets and straight legs with scalloped hems.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Brazilian briefs in jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.

Set with a shirt, suit waistcoat and bow tie in woven fabric. Shirt with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Easy-iron finish. Waistcoat with buttons at the front and fake welt pockets. Lined. Bow tie with an adjustable plastic fastener.
Sports joggers in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, taped details and side pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees for extra mobility and wide ribbed hems.

Shirt woven in a stretch cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and a yoke and darts at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the physique. Narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves create a flattering silhouette.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in an airy weave. High waist with covered elastication. Lined.
Short-sleeved nightdress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a low-cut back, seam at the waist and flared skirt. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Jumper in a soft knit with visible seams at the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbed roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Top in a crêpe weave with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps.
Block-patterned top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and a kangaroo pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Suede sandals with a decorative bow at the front, shimmering metallic details and an ankle strap with a hook and loop tab. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Loose-fit, cotton poplin shirt with a collar, dropped shoulders, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.

Calf-length, pull-on trousers in a cotton weave. Regular, elasticated waist with a frill trim at the top and decorative bow at the front. Small embroidered motif below the waistband, a fake fly, side pockets and gently tapered legs.

Straight-cut dress in a cotton poplin weave with a round neckline and flounce-trimmed, V-shaped seam at the top. Opening and button at the back of the neck, and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication and a small frill trim. Unlined.
Wide top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Calf-length, fitted dress in soft, ribbed jersey with a polo neck and long sleeves.
Short jacket in corduroy with metal buttons. Collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, buttoned cuffs and an adjustable tab and button at the sides. Unlined.
Suede biker jacket with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with a press-stud. Zipped front pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.

Short-sleeved shirt in cotton poplin with a button-down collar, open chest pocket, yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Fine-knit knee socks in a soft cotton blend with a high shaft that ends at the knee.
Boots in imitation leather and imitation suede with pile. Lacing at the front and a zip in the side. Rubber soles. Pile lining.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Side pockets, a print motif on one leg and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Knee-length dressing gown in soft pile with a hood, pockets, and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Flared, calf-length skirt in patterned crinkled chiffon with several layers of raw-edged frills. Concealed zip in the side. Lined.

Trenchcoat in soft, stretch imitation suede with a small stand-up collar, soft lapels and fixed shoulder tabs. Loose yoke front and back, side pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist. No fasteners. Unlined.
Soft leather handbag with two handles, a detachable adjustable shoulder strap, a zip at the top and one zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 12x29x31 cm.
Ankle boots with rounded toes and a zip in the side. Twill linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 7 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Sleeveless top in soft jersey with elastication and a flounce at the top.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.
Large scarf in a soft weave. Size 90x170 cm.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Skirt in checked cotton flannel containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Checked suit trousers in soft wool with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, inset lace detail down the front, and long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication and a flare at the cuffs.

Short, A-line dress in an airy jacquard weave with a low-cut back and horizontal ties at the back of the neck. Long, voluminous sleeves with a puff at the shoulders and buttoned cuffs, and a gathered seam and flounce at the hem for added volume. Lined with a V-neck underdress with adjustable shoulder straps.

Two-button jacket in cotton-blend jersey with notch lapels, patch pockets and a straight-cut hem. Unlined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Fully lined swimsuit with a cut-out section at each side and a partially open back. Shoulder straps that join to form a racer back, and medium coverage at the back.
Thin metal rings in various sizes that can be worn on both the upper and lower part of the finger.
Hat in felted wool with a band. Width of brim 6 cm.
Plastic swimming goggles with decorative rubber appliqués on the front and an adjustable silicone strap at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and draping at the front.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with pointed toes, covered heels and a concealed zip in one side. Recycled polyester linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 5 cm.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with toe caps, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with an elasticated, drawstring waist, discreet side pockets and elasticated hems.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes. Diameter from approx. 1 cm to 2.5 cm.
Washed cotton twill trousers in a regular fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
